00032 #ifndef POWSPEC_FITSIO_H
00033 #define POWSPEC_FITSIO_H
00034 
00035 #include <string>
00036 class fitshandle;
00037 
00038 class PowSpec;
00039 
00040 /*! \defgroup healpix_ps_fitsio_group FITS-based I/O of power spectra */
00041 /*! \{ */
00042 
00043 /*! Opens the FITS file \a filename, jumpd to HDU 2, and reads \a nspecs
00044     columns into \a powspec. \a nspecs must be 1 or 4. */
00045 void read_powspec_from_fits (const std::string &infile,
00046   PowSpec &powspec, int nspecs, int lmax);
00047 /*! Inserts a new binary table into \a out, which contains one or four columns
00048     of FITS type TDOUBLE, and writes the components of \a powspec into it. */
00049 void write_powspec_to_fits (fitshandle &out,
00050   const PowSpec &powspec, int nspecs);
00051 
00052 /*! \} */
00053 
00054 #endif
